sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: Pine Creek in Briargate is a diverse master planned community in northern Colorado Springs. Home choices include patio, single family, semi-custom, and custom homes. Many of these homes enjoy fabulous Peak views. District 20 schools serve this area. Residents enjoy the championship designed Pine Creek Golf Course. Close to several parks, the YMCA, hospitals, shopping, and restaurants. Easy access to I-25 and downtown Colorado Springs.
